duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with clients to understand their insurance needs and provide suitable coverage options.
Build and maintain relationships with clients to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.
Educate clients on different insurance products, their benefits, and coverage details.
Negotiate terms and conditions with clients to reach mutually beneficial agreements.
Manage paperwork, payments, and policy renewals for clients efficiently and accurately.
Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and product offerings to advise clients effectively.
